#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

        int main(){
                int n1,n2,n3,n4;
                while(1){
                cin>>n1>>n2>>n3;
                if(n1==0 && n2==0 && n3==0){
                        break;
                                }
                if(2*n2==(n1+n3)){
                        n4 = n3+(n2-n1);
                        cout<<"AP"<<" " << n4<<endl;
                                    }

                else{
                        n4 = (n3*(n2/n1));
                        cout<<"GP"<<" "<<n4<<endl;
                        }

                        //cin>>n1>>n2>>n3;
                        }
                return 0;
                }
